about_the_game:
Gameplay:

Ray Cheng Trivia Editor is an engaging multiplayer trivia game where strategy and quick thinking are key to victory. Inspired by the classic "Family Feud," this game pits two teams against each other in a battle of wits. Each team must race to type in the most popular answers to given questions, accumulating points based on how common their answers are among surveyed responses. The team with the highest score at the end wins!

Categories:

Dive into a wide range of knowledge with our six default question categories:

  • Bible: Test your knowledge on scripture and stories from the Bible.

  • People: From historical figures to modern celebrities, identify who's who.

  • Geography: Navigate through countries, capitals, and landmarks.

  • Food: Explore dishes, ingredients, and culinary traditions from around the world.

  • Computer: Challenge your tech-savvy side with questions about hardware, software, and internet culture.

  • Biology: Brush up on everything from human anatomy to the wonders of the natural world.

Customization:

  • Custom Categories: Don't see a category you're passionate about? You can create your own, tailoring the game to your interests or group's expertise.

  • Question Management: Add, delete, or edit questions within any category, including setting the correct answers and their scores. This feature allows for endless variation and personalization of the gameplay experience.

Answer Reference Feature:

For each question category, the game will automatically generate a CSV file in "StreamingAssets" folder. If the MC (Master of Ceremonies) needs to know the answers in advance, they can open these CSV files to retrieve the information. The save path is shown in the image provided.



Audio Customization:

  • Personalized Playlists: Bring your own music to the game! Create folders of audio files to use as background music, giving you the power to set the mood or match the theme of your trivia night. Say goodbye to generic game tunes and hello to your favorite tracks.

Features Highlight:

  • Team Play: Designed for two teams, fostering a competitive yet fun environment.

  • Real-Time Typing: Quick reflexes and knowledge matter as teams race to input answers.

  • Score Customization: Adjust scores for answers to make certain questions worth more or less, depending on difficulty or entertainment value.

  • User-Friendly Interface: Easy management of categories, questions, and audio, ensuring that setting up your perfect trivia night is as enjoyable as playing it.

Why Play Ray Cheng Trivia Editor?

Whether you're looking for a fun family night, a lively party game, or an educational tool, Ray Cheng Trivia Editor combines the thrill of competition with the joy of learning. With its customizable nature, it's perfect for any group looking to test their knowledge, celebrate their hobbies, or just have a good time together. Ready to prove your team's the smartest? Let's get quizzing!
